description: Grafana Dashboard for Veeam Backup for Azure (v2)

targets.query: SELECT last("efficiencylogical") FROM "netapp_aggregate_overview" WHERE ("clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/ AND "aggregateName" =~ /^$aggregate$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("efficiencylogical") * (100 / last("spaceblockstorageavailable"))  FROM "netapp_aggregate_overview" WHERE ("clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/ AND "aggregateName" =~ /^$aggregate$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) , "source"  fill(none)
SELECT last("VMSize") AS "VM  Size" FROM "veeam_azure_vm_unprotected" WHERE ("VMName" =~ /^$VMName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "VMName", "VMRegion"
